vodafone.abstract: <0>Your demands and needs:</0><1>If your screen was damaged, could you afford the cost of a new phone or the repair?</1><2>If anything happens to the front screen of your device, would a repair help you? Would Vodafone Mobile Device Insurance help you? If you answer 'Yes' to the above questions, your demands and needs are those of a mobile device owner who wishes and needs to ensure that their repair needs of their mobile device are met now and in the future.</2>
vodafone.title: Let's choose your Vodafone Insurance cover

mediamarkt.abstract: <0>Your demands and needs:</0><1>If your screen was damaged, could you afford the cost of a new phone or the repair?</1><2>If anything happens to the front screen of your device, would a repair help you? mediamarkt.title: Let's choose your Mediamarkt Insurance cover

coverages.liquid_damage_description: Reparamos tu dispositivos si sufre algún daño causado por cualquier líquido. En caso de que no podamos repararlo, no te preocupes, te lo reemplazaremos por uno del mismo modelo
coverages.worldwide_cover_comment: Replacement or repaired devices can only be sent to a UK address
coverages.worldwide_cover_description: Replacement or repaired devices can only be sent to a UK address
coverages.accessories_comment: Up to £200 cover for the same incident when purchased from Vodafone or GetGoFone

default.disclaimer:
Damage & breakdown
About our Insurance Services
To find out more about the Insurance services Vodafone Limited provide, please read:
About our Insurance Services [PDF: 68KB]
Insurance Product Information Document (IPID)
To help you decide if this Insurance provides cover that is right for you, the Insurance Product Information Document summarises the key features, benefits, exclusions and limitations of the cover as well as other important information. This summary is not personalised to you and only contains key details about the Insurance.
Product Information Document (IPID) [PDF: 187KB]
Please also read the Terms and Conditions relating to your cover
Terms and Conditions[PDF: 2.1MB].
If you decide to take out this Insurance, you will receive an Insurance Welcome Pack which will include all the full information including the terms and conditions of the insurance policy within the next 10 working days. If you need to make a claim before you receive it, please call us on +191.
Would you like to proceed?
Please read the key and full information on the insurance cover above. If you are in agreement and would like to take out cover, then you can click "next step".

default.title: 2. Choose your coverage

default.imei_description: The IMEI is a unique number that is used to identify your device.
default.imei_howto: How do I find my IMEI?
default.imei_howto_description: The IMEI is a unique number that is used to identify your device.
default.notice: If you need to change your personal details, you can do this by logging into My Vodafone Account or visiting a Vodafone Store. If you believe the information we hold on you may not be right, please call 191 free from a Vodafone Pay monthly mobile, or 03333 040191 from any other UK phone (standard charges apply).
default.recurring_notice: This is a recurring monthly payment in addition to your Vodafone device and/or airtime plan and will be added each month to your Vodafone invoice.
default.title: 3. Confirm your details

default.criteria:
Please confirm the following:
  1. Your device is in full working order and is not already damaged
  2. Was purchased less than 37 months ago (on or after 23/04/2021) and I have the receipt which includes the IMEI, as a proof of purchase
  3. Was purchased new or reconditioned from the manufacturer, mobile service provider or retail store (high street or online)
  4. You are a UK resident and have a UK billing address
  5. You are 18 years of age or above
  6. You are a Vodafone consumer pay monthly customer. If you are a business customer, please contact us (call 191).
  7. You are the owner of the account
default.criteria_confirmation: I confirm I meet all the criteria above to be eligible for Vodafone Device Insurance
default.disclaimer:
For full eligibility criteria please refer to Help & Support

The Conditions of use as well as the Privacy policy contain information and conditions of use of our website. Our privacy policy explains how we manage your personal information and your rights.
